summary:
{
  "summary": "The Categorical class provides a memory-efficient representation of a one-dimensional array of string values by mapping each unique value to an integer code. It stores the categories, codes, and auxiliary structures for fast grouping, sorting, and indexing. It offers utilities for converting to and from various formats, querying membership, and persisting the categorical data.",
  "business_intent": "Enable memory-efficient handling of high-cardinality string columns in data analysis workflows, accelerating common operations such as grouping, sorting, filtering, and serialization while preserving the ability to map back to original string values.",
  "keywords": [
    "categorical",
    "encoding",
    "memory efficient",
    "string to integer mapping",
    "grouping",
    "sorting",
    "serialization"
  ]
}
}
